I’m Maya Singh, host of the EcoFuture podcast. Our listeners are passionate about environmental issues – 78% of our recent audience data shows a strong interest in climate change, sustainability, and youth activism.

We’re producing an upcoming episode titled **"Climate Action Now: Mobilizing Youth"**. Given your incredible work leading digital climate‑justice campaigns and your ability to mobilize over a million followers, we believe you’d be the perfect voice to inspire our audience to take immediate action.

We’d love to discuss how we can spotlight your recent 2024 digital‑mobilization initiative and explore practical steps listeners can take today. The interview would be a relaxed 45‑minute conversation, recorded at a time that works best for you.

Would you be open to joining us? I’m happy to work around your schedule and can provide any additional details you need.

Thank you for considering this invitation – I’m excited about the possibility of featuring your expertise on EcoFuture!

Warm regards,
Maya Singh
